name: bolt-manager-01-02
description: Demo manageriale calcistica realizzata con Bolt.new

scripts.build: rollup -c && mkdir -p dist && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp src/style.css dist/style.css && mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -r assets/* dist/assets/ && cp -r bolt_src/datasets dist/datasets
